author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012610

This is Yooka-Replaylee, the remastered, remade, remixed version of Playtonic's 3D-platforming collectathon Yooka-Laylee. 

You play as Yooka, the charming green chameleon, and his fluffy little bat companion Laylee as you take on the corporate creep Capital B who is attempting to change the course of the universe by stealing all the Pagies to the One Book.

With a whole host of improvements, enhancements, brand new secrets and challenges hiding behind every corner, all sprinkled across a stunning and vibrant story book world displayed to you in beautiful 4K, we cannot wait for you to experience the definitive version of the favourite buddy-duo's very first adventure when it lands on PlayStation 5 in 2025!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Yooka-Replaylee - Release Window Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012198/

Jeff Minter is back with another unique take on a 1980s Atari arcade game: I, Robot. 

Reimagined in Minter’s signature assault of colors, shapes and sounds, this new take on the eclectic arcade title is built from the ground up with new challenges, new twists, and a whole lot of llamas. Coming 4/17 to PS5, PS VR2, and PS4!
title: I, Robot - Release Date Trailer | PS5, PS4 & PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010911

We are all but lost lambs... are we not? 

KARMA: The Dark World Launches March 27th on PlayStation 5 with Pro enhancements.

Our demo invites players to step into the shoes of Roam Agent Daniel Mcgovern, and see the investigation process as he explores the memories of a citizen accused of treachery, as well as the twisted environments and monstrous manifestations he encounters along the way.

But how much of this is real? How reliable is the mind of a man broken by Leviathans iron fist? And should what lurks in the shadows of those memories be seen by anyone at all...?

Wishlist now!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Karma: The Dark World - Dreamcore Demo Trailer | PS5 Games
